name: Super Dumb Cyber Rangers
description:
As the leader of Super Dumb Cyber Rangers your duty is to manage your fellow team members and resist the evil rampage of the Ultra Evil Chicken Empire!!!

Assign both yourself and your team members on different parts of your mecha, each character has different styles and perks!!!

HOW TO PLAY

CONTROLS

MECHA MODULES

ASSIGN, ADAPT, ATTACK!!!
